main event: An observer reported seeing a hovering object with bright lights north of Marlboro, New York on January 20, 1966.
interesting points: The object was described as being about the size of a medicine ball,The observer noted two bright lights and a rotating red and green light on the object,The object flew in a rectangular pattern and was visible for 2-3 minutes,The observer was a 26-year-old research technician,The investigating officer concluded it was likely an aircraft in a holding pattern for landing.
sighted object: one object with two bright lights and a red and green flashing light
